Simulate function.

Source: R/simulate.R
simulate.Rd

Simulate function.

Usage

simulate(
  model,
  dataset,
  dest = NULL,
  events = NULL,
  scenarios = NULL,
  tablefun = NULL,
  outvars = NULL,
  outfun = NULL,
  seed = NULL,
  replicates = 1,
  dosing = FALSE,
  settings = NULL
)

# S4 method for class 'replicated_campsis_model,dataset,character,events,scenarios,function,character,output_function,integer,integer,logical,simulation_settings'

  model,
  dataset,

  events = NULL,
  scenarios = NULL,
  tablefun = NULL,
  outvars = NULL,
  outfun = NULL,
  seed = NULL,
  replicates = 1,
  dosing = FALSE,
  settings = NULL
)

# S4 method for class 'campsis_model,tbl_df,rxode_engine,events,scenarios,function,character,output_function,integer,integer,logical,simulation_settings'
simulate(
  model,
  dataset,
  dest = NULL,
  events = NULL,
  scenarios = NULL,
  tablefun = NULL,
  outvars = NULL,
  outfun = NULL,
  seed = NULL,
  replicates = 1,
  dosing = FALSE,
  settings = NULL
)

# S4 method for class 'campsis_model,tbl_df,mrgsolve_engine,events,scenarios,function,character,output_function,integer,integer,logical,simulation_settings'
simulate(
  model,
  dataset,
  dest = NULL,
  events = NULL,
  scenarios = NULL,
  tablefun = NULL,
  outvars = NULL,
  outfun = NULL,
  seed = NULL,
  replicates = 1,
  dosing = FALSE,
  settings = NULL
)

Arguments

model

generic CAMPSIS model

dataset

CAMPSIS dataset or 2-dimensional table

dest

destination simulation engine, default is 'RxODE'

events

interruption events

scenarios

list of scenarios to be simulated

tablefun

function or lambda formula to apply on exported 2-dimensional dataset

outvars

variables to output in resulting dataframe

outfun

an output function to apply on the simulation results. Type ?Outfun for more info.

seed

seed value

replicates

number of replicates, default is 1

dosing

output dosing information, default is FALSE

settings

advanced simulation settings

Value

dataframe with all results
